name: Pocky & Rocky with Becky
description: A long time ago, a goddess sealed the evil Hydra Dragon inside a cave to stop to its hauntings across the land. But peace is abruptly cut short as the evil ghost awakens and unleashes the most terrible mythical creatures in revenge for its time of imprisonment. It's up to Pocky, Rocky the Raccoon, or Becky to set out on a fantastical and dangerous adventure to seal the Hydra Dragon once more! Choose one of the three selectable characters, and collect magical items and a variety of power-ups that enhance each character's unique spells and abilities. Help them on their journey battling pesky ghosts and monsters before the final showdown against the Hydra Dragon!
